entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage or the fire damage (your choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th, and the height of the cylinder increases by 10 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Frostwind Blade

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell's casting and make a melee attack with it against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and it becomes coated with frost, causing its walking speed to be reduced by 10 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} cold damage to the target on a hit. The cold damage increases by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8}) and again at 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Hydraulic Blast
entries: A blast of high-pressure water erupts from your hands. All creatures in a straight line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@damage 3d6} bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10 feet back in the direction of the line. On a success, the creature takes half damage and is not pushed.
Unprotected flames in this line are extinguished.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd Level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 3d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Lightning Storm
entries: Storm clouds suddenly gather and unleash a barrage of lightning. All creatures within 30 feet of a point you can see within range must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 4d12} lightning damage, or half as much on a successful save.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th Level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Quench
entries: Select a point in the air that you can see within 120 feet.

When you cast this spell, a heavy mist of humidity forms within a 30-foot sphere around that point. All non-magical flames within that sphere are immediately extinguished, and magical fire deals only half damage.

entries.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Rock Blast
entries: You conjure and launch a ball of hard rock at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack at the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10} bludgeoning), 11th level ({@dice 3d10} bludgeoning), and 17th level ({@dice 4d10} bludgeoning).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Water Spout
entries: A cold stream of water blasts from your hand toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack at the target. On a hit, the creature takes {@damage 1d4} cold damage and {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage. If the target is on fire, the flames are immediately extinguished. You can choose to use this spell to extinguish flames without dealing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d4} cold damage and {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4} cold{@dice  + 2d4} bludgeoning), 11th level ({@dice 3d4} cold{@dice  + 3d4} bludgeoning), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4} cold + {@dice 4d4} bludgeoning).

spell.name: Lightning Rod

components.m: a piece of copper or aluminum wire

entries: You ground yourself and become a living lightning rod.

While the spell is active and your feet remain on the ground, you have resistance to lightning damage. Attacks that deal lightning damage have advantage against you, and disadvantage against all creatures within 120 feet of you. When a creature within 120 feet of you would take lightning damage, you can use your reaction to cause yourself and that creature to each take half that damage instead, before resistance is applied.

entries.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Rock Blast
entries: You conjure and launch a ball of hard rock at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack at the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell's damage increases by
{@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10} bludgeoning), 11th level ({@dice 3d10} bludgeoning), and 17th level ({@dice 4d10} bludgeoning).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Shocking Blade

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell's casting and make a melee attack with it against one creature within 5 feet of you. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and additionally is jolted with electricity, and cannot take reactions until after the start of its next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} lightning damage to the target on a hit. The lightning damage increases by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8}) and again at 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Tidal Wave (Revised)
entries: You conjure up a wave of water that crashes down on an area within range. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@damage 4d8} bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10 feet and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked pushed or knocked {@condition prone}. The water then spreads out across the ground in all directions, extinguishing unprotected flames in its area and within 30 feet of it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th Level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer

spell.name: Water Spout
entries: A cold stream of water blasts from your hand toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack at the target. On a hit, the creature takes {@damage 1d4} cold damage and
{@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage. If the target is on fire, the flames are immediately extinguished. You can choose to use this spell to extinguish flames without dealing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d4} cold damage and {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4} cold{@dice  + 2d4} bludgeoning), 11th level ({@dice 3d4} cold{@dice  + 3d4} bludgeoning), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4} cold +
{@dice 4d4} bludgeoning).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Class
entries: Sorcerer
